posts.title: Hello World
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. 测试中文：欢迎来到Hexo，这是你的第一个博客！Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. 💡 测试引用块 test A test B
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. 测试中文：欢迎来到Hexo，这是你的第一个博客！Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. 💡 测试引用块 test A test B Quick Start Create a new post Test Math: eiπ+1=0e^{i\pi}+1=0eiπ+1=0 eiπ+1=0e^{i\pi}+1=0 eiπ+1=0 P(z)={1/2z=01/2z=1P(z) = \begin{cases} 1/2 & z=0 \\\\ 1/2 & z=1 \end{cases} P(z)=⎩⎪⎨⎪⎧​1/21/2​z=0z=1​ 1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server 1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files 1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites 1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
